attributes.action: Provide Prison Officers with stab proof / bullet proof vests and personal protective equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that Prison Officers should be provided with Stab / Bullet proof vests for when they are on Duty. At present Prison Officers have no Personal Protective Equipment and are surrounded by a 100% Criminal element, ranging from Burglars to Mass Murderers.

The Police are surrounded by about 4% of the criminal element at any one time, and they have anti stab / bullet proof vests, I think that Prison Officers should get the same standard of equipment Police Officers as Prison Officers do a dangerous, demanding and tough job.
